name: CosmicCraft
description:
Cosmic Craft is my first game i  made as a single developer for Jamcraft 5 in 8 days.

You can also se my devlog for this project at My youtube channel and i will also post future game dev vlogs there to.

--- The Game ---

You are stranded in deep space surrounded by aliens on all fronts!

the ship you were traveling with has losts its energy cores and as the great engineer you are you need to craft a new Energy Core while dodging Aliens but be careful the energy of the ship is slowly expiring so you need to think carefully when you craft the machines and parts you need!

Controls:

  • Click on a scientist to select and use WASD to move.
  • Click on a machine in your cargo to enter build mode.
  • Click on a placed machine to enter the crafting view.
